docs.name: Vocat API
docs.info: Vocat is a teaching and learning platform that facilitates qualitative and quantitative assessment of a range of media. Built as a collaboration between the Center for Teaching and Learning at Baruch College, City University of New York and Cast Iron Coding of Portland, Oregon, the tool is in active development.

resources.name: Discussion posts
resources.full_description: Discussion Posts appear on submission detail views. A post can be threaded, and can have another discussion posts as its parent. As with annotations, the author_id value of a discussion post is set to the user who creates the post. The API does not currently provide a mechanism for creating discussion posts that belong to other users.

methods.name: update

apis.short_description: creates a discussion post for a submission

params.name: id
params.description: The ID of the discussion post to be updated

params.name: submission_id
params.description: The ID of the submission being discussed

params.name: parent_id
params.description: If the post is a reply to another post, this is the ID of the parent post.

params.name: body
params.description: The body of the post, can be Markdown which will be converted to HTML when the post is rendered
